site_name: Morden College Homes, 19 St Germans Place, Blackheath, SE3
description: An application submitted under Section 73 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990 for a minor material amendment in connection with the planning permission dated 05/10/2018 (Reference: 16/3784/F) as amended by Section 73 application dated 24/05/2019 (Reference: 19/0485/MA) for the construction of a new mixed use community building for the residents of Morden College, providing workshops for Arts and Crafts, Cafe, Shop, Medical Facilities and various social spaces to allow:- Installation of 18 Photovoltaic Panels to roof of Morden Hall- Replacement of Rainwater pipes with Rainwater chains on colonnade and arts and craft yard- Alteration to service doors at rear kitchen elevation to provide free ventilation area.
